name: Zenus VR
description:
Published on VRFocus.com and various VR news outlets http://www.vrfocus.com/2016/05/survive-alien-attacks-in-zenus-vr-now-launched-on-google-cardboard/

Zenus VR is an outer space virtual reality first-person shooter, set out 2,000 years in the future! Zenus VR delivers a futuristic first person experience that has been optimized to deliver a competitive, immersive and seamless experience in Virtual Reality!

STORY:
You are the lone human survivor on the eerie planet of Zenus and the inhabitants don't take kindly to visitors!
Your presence is not welcome and your only goal is to make it out alive!!!!


Use your VR-headset as your Laser Ray Goggles to survive!!!!!

Known compatible VR Headsets: Google Cardboard, Boxzr VR, Merge VR, Homido VR, Zeiss VR One, Freefly VR, Durovis Dive, I Am Cardboard or any other Cardboard or iOS compatible VR Headset!

Features:
• Virtual Reality Mode
• Choice of automatic shooting or headset trigger shooting
• Powerful laser weapon upgrades (The longer you survive, the more powerful your weapon becomes!)
• Special effects and animated sceneries
• Game Center integration
• Powerful Immersion
• Minimum iPhone requirement is iPhone 4s or later

Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter @ZenusVR

Please read Privacy Policy before playing
